examples:
[{"name":"Select All Text","description":"**cmd + a**

selects all text in a file","image":"https://images.code.org/e4d3fc541e989c75b26353461cf1eef5-selectall.gif"},{"name":"Copy Selected Text","description":"**cmd + c**

copies the selected text"},{"name":"Cut Selected Text","description":"**cmd + x**

cuts the selected text","image":"https://images.code.org/703632b78c70de49e2062121df3163f2-cutselection.gif"},{"name":"Paste Selected Text","description":"**cmd + v**

pastes the selected text","image":"https://images.code.org/fcb0a113c0828ab170a3dd5bc0a6312d-pasteselection.gif"},{"name":"Undo the Last Change","description":"**cmd + z**

undo the last change","image":"https://images.code.org/95bc3c0e7ea5ad4b3fc53c7405033108-undo.gif"},{"name":"Open the Find/Replace Window","description":"**cmd + f**

opens the find/replace window

To close the find/replace window, click Esc or the small x in the top-right corner.","image":"https://images.code.org/c1f1edcabe0b918f63f16e7ba2dd6abc-findreplace.gif"},{"name":"Move Cursor Left, Right, Up, or Down","description":"**Arrow Left/Right/Up/Down**

moves the cursor left, right, up, or down","image":"https://images.code.org/98d3329339cb6e2761f6b7755c84edf1-movecursor.gif"},{"name":"Move to the Top or Bottom of a File","description":"**cmd + Arrow Up/Down**

goes to the top or bottom of a file","image":"https://images.code.org/3b92e9d6a1df2cb688b6f518f728332a-topbottom.gif"},{"name":"Insert a New Line and Indent","description":"**Enter**

inserts a new line and indents","image":"https://images.code.org/81f60823f3e27565f4824b5daa5f34b7-newline.gif"},{"name":"Insert Two Spaces","description":"**Tab**

inserts two spaces","image":"https://images.code.org/43441503657556d12d850ca519368cfd-indent.gif"},{"name":"Delete the Line Before the Cursor","description":"**cmd + Backspace**

deletes the line before the cursor"},{"name":"Delete the Line After the Cursor","description":"**Ctrl + Delete**

deletes the line after the cursor"},{"name":"Comment Out Selection or Line","description":"**cmd + /**

comments out the current selection or the current line if no selection","image":"https://images.code.org/fd95e1dfeed4d57ad20425f5c4aebeb3-comment.gif"},{"name":"Decrease Indent","description":"**cmd + [**

decrease indent","image":"https://images.code.org/9ab793ae3f828e815633039c88e4f2c1-decreaseindent.gif"},{"name":"Increase Indent","description":"**cmd + ]**

increase indent","image":"https://images.code.org/1e1a0345ea93a1810a94e9d150eb1c08-increaseindent.gif"},{"name":"Go to Matching Bracket","description":"**Shift + cmd + \**

go to the matching bracket (only when on a bracket)","image":"https://images.code.org/7221cfa492df29ff4c828801766577aa-matchingbracket.gif"}]
name: Mac: Basic Commands
